text: "Somewhere Out There" is a 2002 alternative rock song by the Canadian alternative rock band Our Lady Peace. It is the first single from their fifth studio album Gravity, which was released in 2002. The song was written by Raine Maida. The song was the most successful song on the album. It was also the most internationally successful single ever released by the band. Category:Our Lady Peace songs Category:2002 songs
title: Somewhere Out There (Our Lady Peace song)
